alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Western Essex; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 5:01PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy rain and gusty winds will impact of the Metro West and Northeast areas of Massachusetts through 600 PM EDT... At 457 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pepperell southwest to around Douglas. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor tree damage. Heavy rains will cause minor flooding in poor drainage and low lying areas, including highways and interstates in the area. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Newton, Lawrence, Framingham, Haverhill, Waltham, Medford, Methuen, Arlington, Billerica, Marlborough, Woburn, Shrewsbury, Chelmsford, Andover, Natick, Watertown, Franklin, Lexington and Dracut. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
